languages.text: {n}На мгновение маска бесстрастности трескается на лице Иокасты. Одной рукой она задирает ваш рукав, а второй уже вонзает наконечник длинного стеклянного шприца в очаг разросшейся сыпи. По телу пробегает судорога, и холодный пот выступает на висках. Но зуд спадает, вам сразу становится легче.{/n} "Император... оградил..."

{n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. She rolls up your sleeve with one hand, already pushing the tip of a long glass syringe into the centre of the growing rash with the other. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение маска бесстрастности трескается на лице Иокасты. Одной рукой она задирает ваш рукав, а второй уже вонзает наконечник длинного стеклянного шприца в очаг разросшейся сыпи. По телу пробегает судорога, и холодный пот выступает на висках. Но зуд спадает, вам сразу становится легче.{/n} "Император... оградил..."

languages.text: {n}Jusque-là nonchalante, Jocasta blêmit. Elle s'empresse de relever l'une de vos manches d'une main et, de l'autre, plante sans autre forme de cérémonie l'aiguille d'une longue seringue de verre en plein milieu de l'éruption cutanée qui semble s'être encore propagée depuis la dernière fois que vous avez posé les yeux dessus. À mesure que le produit se diffuse, vous sentez votre corps se contracter et des gouttes de sueur froide se mettent à dégouliner de votre front, mais très vite, les démangeaisons s'estompent. Vous vous sentez subitement beaucoup mieux.{/n} « L'Empereur... a protégé... »
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. She rolls up your sleeve with one hand, already pushing the tip of a long glass syringe into the centre of the growing rash with the other. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."

Vous vous sentez subitement beaucoup mieux.{/n} « L'Empereur... a protégé... »

languages.text: {n}La máscara de indiferencia de Sauerback se quiebra. Te remanga con una mano al tiempo que clava la larga aguja de una jeringuilla de cristal en el creciente sarpullido con la otra. Un calambre recorre tu cuerpo y te sobreviene un sudor frío. Pero el picor remite y empiezas a encontrarte mejor de inmediato.{/n} «El Emperador... l{mf|e|a} ha protegido...».
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. She rolls up your sleeve with one hand, already pushing the tip of a long glass syringe into the centre of the growing rash with the other. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La máscara de indiferencia de Sauerback se quiebra. Te remanga con una mano al tiempo que clava la larga aguja de una jeringuilla de cristal en el creciente sarpullido con la otra. Un calambre recorre tu cuerpo y te sobreviene un sudor frío. Pero el picor remite y empiezas a encontrarte mejor de inmediato.{/n} «El Emperador... l{mf|e|a} ha protegido...».

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克冷冰冰的表情立刻消失不见。她一只手挽起你的袖子，另一只手抽出了一支长长的玻璃注射器，将尖针刺入了疹子的中心部分。你感觉浑身仿佛触了电一样，冷汗从太阳穴上冒了出来，但身上的瘙痒很快就减退了，你的身体也感觉舒服多了。{/n}“帝皇……保佑……”
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. She rolls up your sleeve with one hand, already pushing the tip of a long glass syringe into the centre of the growing rash with the other. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックの平静を装っていた仮面が、砕け散った。彼女はあなたの袖を片手でまくり、もう片方の手で長いガラス注射器の先端を、大きくなっている発疹の中心に押し込んだ。あなたの体は痙攣し、こめかみに冷や汗が出た。しかし、かゆみは治まり、すぐに気分が良くなった。{/n}「皇帝…守られた…」
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. She rolls up your sleeve with one hand, already pushing the tip of a long glass syringe into the centre of the growing rash with the other. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."

traits.locale_text: ザウアーバックの平静を装っていた仮面が、砕け散った。彼女はあなたの袖を片手でまくり、もう片方の手で長いガラス注射器の先端を、大きくなっている発疹の中心に押し込んだ。あなたの体は痙攣し、こめかみに冷や汗が出た。しかし、かゆみは治まり、すぐに気分が良くなった。{/n}「皇帝…守られた…」

languages.text: {n}Die Maske der Nonchalance auf Sauerbacks Gesicht zerspringt. Sie rollt mit einer Hand deinen Ärmel hoch und drückt gleichzeitig bereits mit der anderen die Spitze einer langen Glasspritze in die Mitte des sich ausbreitenden Ausschlags. Ein Krampf durchzuckt deinen Körper und kalter Schweiß erscheint auf deinen Schläfen. Doch das Jucken lässt nach und du beginnst augenblicklich, dich besser zu fühlen.{/n} "Der Imperator ... hat beschützt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in yüzündeki duygusuz ifade paramparça oluyor. Tek eliyle kolunu sıvarken diğeriyle de uzun bir şırınganın ucunu, büyümekte olan isiliğin merkezine hızlıca sokuyor. Bedenine kramp giriyor ve şakaklarından buz gibi terler dökülüyor. Fakat kaşıntı yatışıyor ve çok geçmeden kendini daha iyi hissetmeye başlıyorsun.{/n} "İmparator... Korudu."
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of nonchalance on Sauerback's face shatters. She rolls up your sleeve with one hand, already pushing the tip of a long glass syringe into the centre of the growing rash with the other. A cramp runs through your body, and a cold sweat breaks out on your temples. But the itching subsides, and you start to feel much better immediately.{/n} "The Emperor... protected..."
